short_summary: For military science and research contracted
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of National Defense seeks to provide services on an as-and-when requested basis. The company shall have access to small quantities of equipment of interest to the Department, prepare them for testing, and then provide the necessary sounding infrastructure. Want to put aircraft with the equipment probably.
full_summary:
# W6399-21LD57: Services and Technical Support Contract ACAN

## Notification Type
Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

## Publication Date
May 17, 2023

## Tender Closing Date
June 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time

## Project Overview
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking a contractor for a Services and Technical Support Contract for the National Department of Defense (DND). The service provider will be required to provide on-demand support to the DND for the testing and evaluation of specialized military equipment. This may include providing access to equipment items, preparing test equipment, and facilitating testing through the provision of specialized personnel, infrastructure, or support vehicles.

## Requirements
- Provide on-demand access to military equipment items for testing and evaluation.
- Prepare equipment for testing and assist with testing procedures.
- Coordinate maintenance or repair of equipment as needed.
- Return or dispose of equipment post-testing.
- Utilize an airborne sensing aircraft for the evaluation of airborne sensors in a dedicated aircraft.

## Contact Information:
* Contact Name: Jean-Renaud Proulx (SPAC/PWGS)
* Contact Email: jean-renaud.proulx@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Country: Canada (for language details see notice URL)

## Notice URL
View the full notice at: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16308823>

## Areas of Delivery
- Quebec, Canada

## Relevant Pages
For details on this tender, including the complete notice document and any attachments, please refer to the official tender notice at the link provided above. Please contact the contracting officer with questions or for more information.

## Attachment
None
